languages.en: //(0,3)\\Hey! I've got him! He punched me in the back of the head and ran like a little girl!

languages.it: //(0,3)\\Hey! I've got him! He punched me in the back of the head and ran like a little girl!
languages.de: //(0,3)\\Hey! I've got him! He punched me in the back of the head and ran like a little girl!
languages.es: //(0,3)\\Hey! I've got him! He punched me in the back of the head and ran like a little girl!
languages.ru: //(0,3)\\Привет! Он у меня есть! Он ударил меня по затылку и побежал, как маленькая девочка!
languages.cn: //(0,3)\\嘿，我逮到他了！他朝我后脑勺打了一拳，然后像个小姑娘似的跑了！
languages.tc: //(0,3)\\嗨！我抓到他了！他一拳打在我的後腦勺上，然後像個小女孩一樣跑了！
